title: No junglers released in over 2 years
body:
If you go back and look at the list of champions released in order, you will see the last dedicated jungle champion released was Kayn. Back in summer 2017. Are they just more difficult to make or what? There was a period where Sylas jungle was playable but that's pretty much been nerfed to hell. Qiyana has a 39.9% winrate in jungle so its clearly not her intended roll. Come on Riot jungle is already bad as is it is at least give us some champions to play.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
You can play Ornn, Sylas and Qiyana in jungle 
Also, before Kayn there were 3/6 junglers released, Taliyah, Camille and Ivern
I think he means champions that were made to jungle.

So Which lane were made to play Neeko? Top, adc, mid or supp? 
As soon as your winrate is above as 50 %, you can play almost every champ in every lane. There are not so much champs made to X lane
Qiyana and sylas were both announced as solo laners... I am not sure about the other champs because I didnt play when they were released.
Camille got specifically designed as a top lane bruiser, according to Riot.
Just like Vi was or how Elise was released as a mage/mid laner but wound up playing more as a diver/assassin jungler.

The difference is that they specifically made balance decisions to force Camille out of the jungle, while they embraced the jungler playstyle for Vi and Elise.

Another recent example would be Pyke, who **is** specifically designed to be an assassin played in the support position and they made alot of changes to him to force him out of other lanes.

It was a different beast in the past, yes, there have been many champions which ended up in other positions than they were initially designed for. But nowadays, Riot has specific roles in mind for the champions and will balance them around this position. Either because the champion is supposed to fill a specific gameplay niche (Pyke as the assassin support) or because their kit is simply not healthy in other positions (Camille as a jungler in my opinion).
Oh I know, was just saying they had similar things happen.
Champions are indeed designed to be played in specific places. Can they often play others? Yes, but they weren't specifically tailored to do those others.

What the hell are you talking about, Riot before has literally said each champion having multiple roles is a large consideration to every design they make. 

The only latest single-role champion is Yuumi, and she still arguably has multiple playstyles between funneling junglers and mid laners, and support bot lane.

They absolutely are tailored to have multiple roles in mind...they only way I could even see you not agreeing with this is if you've never played Jungle, where MANY champions are balanced on the side to operate well there too. Malzahar to this day still only has AD scaling because of fucking "Jungle Malzahar". He doesn't have AD scaling because he is a mid laner, obviously, and is not tailored to a single role, but rather balanced to handle multiple roles.

As I said, they have a specific role in mind but can be played in others. {{champion:235}}  they said was built as an ADC thus she could go in the carry position but was designed for the Support position so she could lane with Lucian.

Several champions they have made balance changes that even for them out of certain roles to keep them in other places or even under played. {{champion:164}}  released as a top laner, often seen as a Jungler had changes that made her less desirable in the Jungle. 

Only? How often do you see {{champion:267}} {{champion:40}} solo? Huh? Playstyles and lane they are played in isn't the same thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Veloz Destello,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GAm3J1AE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-19T21:53:46.626+0000)
>
> You can play Ornn, Sylas and Qiyana in jungle 
> Also, before Kayn there were 3/6 junglers released, Taliyah, Camille and Ivern

Ornn jungle has a <0.1% pick rate with a 41% win rate. Sylas jungle has a 0.4% pick rate with a 42% win rate. Qiyana jungle has a decent 3.0% pick rate...with a sub 40% win rate. Point being these champions are not viable junglers. They're off meta 'for fun' picks at best. I'm talking about a champion who's primary and intended role is jungling.

So Gragas, Sejuani or Panth arent either junglers? 
Yuumi is only played in supp and have 41 % wr 3 % pr. With that logic Yuumi is designed to not be played?

> [{quoted}](name=Veloz Destello,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GAm3J1AE,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2019-11-19T22:02:06.915+0000)
>
> So Gragas, Sejuani or Panth arent either junglers? 
> Yuumi is only played in supp and have 41 % wr 3 % pr. With that logic Yuumi is designed to not be played?

Yuumi is a champion that has intrinsic balance issues similar to Akali. She's clearly a support champion, but her kit is very strong and is being kept in a bad balance state right now until they figure out what to do with her, similar to Kalista. Yuumi's role % is like 95% support. Clearly a support champion. Sejuani is a jungler because if you look at the stats, her primary role is jungle because that's where she's played in like 90% of games shes picked. Pantheon is a weird one because he can be played in both top, mid and kind of jungle, but his kit is very pokey and if you look at professional players, very very few people play him jungle. Gragas is a jungler but hes ancient I'm not sure why you bring that up. 

Again, i'm talking about a champion where it is CLEAR and OBVIOUS the champion was designed around jungling.

> [{quoted}](name=Fear the Kayn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GAm3J1AE,comment-id=0001000100000000,timestamp=2019-11-19T22:08:47.231+0000)
>
> Yuumi is a champion that has intrinsic balance issues similar to Akali. She's clearly a support champion, but her kit is very strong and is being kept in a bad balance state right now until they figure out what to do with her, similar to Kalista.

I find it a bit sad that Kalista came out around this time of year _in 2014_ and Riot's design team is still up to this nonsense. Not only have these unworkable designs continued to pop up, they've become the norm.

qiyana and sylas are very much so viable junglers, the fact that almost nobody that plays these has any idea how to do so doesn't change the fact that the champions are extremely good in the jungle when played properly.
You think Riot cares about junglers when the only thing they were doing these last years is nerfing them?

its a net buff for season 10 though?

by nerfing xp one one side to give it to the other, a jungler can start either side viably thus increasing path diversity in general, and because of this you're actually up 12% xp from this season.

its a net buff for junglers season 10, especially the farm types.
If you didnt look they nerfed all the jungle xp and they nerfed catchup experience they buffed gromp xp. Nerfed every camp xp and some camps were nerfed gold

Because they spawn more frequently.

I’m so tired of people like you on here posting half truths for whatever agenda.
Riot's VGUing 2 junglers right now and don't forget the evelynn VGU.  It's not like they aren't doing anything.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GAm3J1AE,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-11-19T23:26:06.167+0000)
>
> and don't forget the evelynn VGU.

*Nunu (& Willump) VGU casually gets forgotten*
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 
XD

You are absolutely correct. Still, that goes to the underlying point that ATM riot feels it's more important to fix some of the older junglers than add new ones.  Shyvana, Mundo, and Shaco are probably high on the VGU list so the role is not being forgotten about.
Isn't Shyvana basically scheduled for after Fiddle and Voli? Because while those two won overall, and were nearly tied, Shyvanna won in China.

She came in third but I don't think riot committed to doing her immediately after fiddle/voli.  They were only going to do one champ but because those two came in so close, riot bumped the runner up into the VGU queue.  

That said, I wouldn't be surprised if she isn't done in 2020 or 2021 along with mundo who was also on the list.  Considering AP shyvana functions more like a ranged bruiser and has too much zoning with ult+E, if I were riot getting her back into the melee space she belongs in would be a medium priority.
??? Qiyana is a great jg what are you on about

> [{quoted}](name=Crowsian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GAm3J1AE,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2019-11-20T18:54:12.837+0000)
>
> ??? Qiyana is a great jg what are you on about

38.5% winrate is not "great".
How much have you played her in the jungle to come to that conclusion? lol. She ain't good

when riot try to make a jungler they make a solo laner.
when riot try to make a solo laner they end up in the jungle.
aphelios will probably be a jungler.
Agreed, but another problem is... we need to rework a lot of jungle champs and items.
Nah we need more marksmen lul.
LOOOOOOOOOL TRUE
All the kiddos play right click outplay so we have to get those sick lcs outplays of adcs side stepping one skill shot and autoing a team down for a pentakill.
I think it's because Jungle is not such preferable as a role in general. They'd maximise sales if the champion they made was either assassin , mage , or marksman.

If you play as fill you get stuck as a jungler more than support now lol. But honestly as a jg main I can say the only thing that blows is the constant whineing I can go gank top and my bot spams pings while I'm topside lol.

"OMG enemy jungle ganked 4590 times and our jungle 0"
-Cait *died under enemy tower*

what i have noticed is that riot wants to make the game ridged, and they want to enforce a specific meta and role for champions. Camille was a good jungler, they nerfed her jungle, Sylas was a decent jungler, they nerfd that. i dont like it when champions are made for just one specific role, it makes the champion less divers to play and boring, what about having fun in this game ffs? this is why season 1 and 2 and 3 were the best, then the pro crap came in and the game went to hell.
I’m pretty sure the teased the champ after Aphelios to be a “juggernaut” (don’t quote me on that) however I’m not sure if they can be played in the jungle or not
No he's a marksman and the next new champion is the juggernaut.

AFTER Aphelios it's a juggernaut is what he said. 

"After 1 is 2"
"No, 1 is first then it's 2."

Next new champ will be a Jungler.
They already leaked that.
Also Voli Rework in Summer 2020 is designed for Jungle prio.
No, the next new champ is Aphelios (adc), then the juggernaut, then fiddle, voli and THEN the jungler .
Oh ok... SO late? :(
Yeah. Probably by like I'd guess July or even August of 2020 unfortunately.

3 champs have been released that can jungle, Qiyana, Sylas and Pyke. As far as dedicated jungler, 5 of the last 6 champs can play multiple roles. Only Yummi has like 1 playable role that makes sense. 

besides if any rolse needs to complain about the number of champs released its ADCs, look how far behind they are in amount of champs used in each role. 


Mid - 60 champs
Top - 50 champs
Jungle - 42 champs
Support - 38 champs
ADC - **19** champs (And thats including the new champ Senna......... and 22 if you include Heimerginger, Swain and Ziggs that people sometimes use.

In all fairness as others have mentioned that's because several of the most recent champions can jungle it's just not their primary role.

Although I'm not too worried about that either.  Jungle is one of the more open lanes in the game in that you can jungle with a lot of things so long as they can clear and sustain their health bar.  Jungle diversity is better than other lanes.

Srr but riot wants more adcs to sell their skins. Jg is one of the least popular roles while mid and adc are the most popular selling most skins. I'm jg and kayn main myself and waiting patiently for a new jungler

The pantheon rework was designed for top lane and jungle, with his jungle clear being buffed after it was subpar. This, to me, looks like a champion who is intended to be able to jungle, and thus, I’d say Pantheon is the most recent jungler. If you disclude reworks, and the frisky Sylas jungle business, then it’s been a hot minute since we’ve gotten a new jungle champion.
Fiddle rework is coming up soon. That might as well be a new jungle champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Rax Reformed,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=GAm3J1AE,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2019-11-20T10:24:18.345+0000)
>
> Fiddle rework is coming up soon. That might as well be a "new" jungle champion.

There, fixed it for you
